welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Santomera, known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our city's unique culture and indulge in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Javier Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Javier Airport, primarily used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alicante El Altet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.
